message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18000. It's a fantastic deal and I'm confident it's worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $16000 for the product. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product and understand your position. While $16000 is a good offer, I'm still looking for a bit more to make this deal work. How about $17000? This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product, and it gives us both a good deal. Let me know your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've done some research and found that the market value for this product is closer to $16000. Considering this, I would like to propose an offer of $16500. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can come to an agreement.
